ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Mean mean nasty Maestro
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is *very* good to know.  I d always figured there was something like this going on (I walked away from Vox alive and unaggroed after everyone else had
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 11 Apr 2000, Miriana wrote:
>
> Actually, for Dojorn sitting should be ok. The only thing the
> caster needs to be sure of is that they've scrolled off the agro list when
> he sits down. When my guild killed Dojorn last time, I simply cons'd it
> until it was indifferent again then sat down out of the AE rain spell's

This is *very* good to know. I'd always figured there was
something like this going on (I walked away from Vox alive and
unaggroed after everyone else had died), but had never seen
proof for it. You just provided it. Thanks. :)

Unfortunately, it doesn't really work against mobs that
normally are ready to attack you.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
